attributes.action: allow bona fida under 18 year sports teams registered with the relevant national governing body free use of sports facilities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: many sports facilities charge too high a price for under 18 teams to be able to train in reasonable facilities. Local councils should allow use by bona fida teams of the facilities free for charge, utilising their own funds to enhance their training. This can only help young people achieve more possibly to olympic grades and improve the fitness levels of our future generations
